name: AsyncWebServer_Ethernet
description: Asynchronous HTTP and WebSocket Server Library for ESP8266 using W5x00 or ENC28J60 Ethernet. This is Asynchronous HTTP and WebSocket Server Library for ESP8266 using W5x00 or ENC28J60 Ethernet with lwIP_5100, lwIP_5500 or lwIP_enc28j60 library
keywords: http, async, async-webserver, websocket, webserver, esp8266, w5x00, enc28j60
